original_text: Abishai the brother of Joab was chief of the Three. He raised his spear against three hundred men, whom he killed, and so he became as famous as the Three.
korean_text: 요압의 아우 아비새는 그 세 명 중 우두머리라 그가 창을 휘둘러 삼백 명을 죽이고 그 세 명 가운데에 이름을 얻었으니

sentences.original_text: He raised his spear against three hundred men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 삼백 명의 적을 향해 창을 들었다

sentences.original_text: and so he became as famous as the Three
